content.label: I bought this game because it was a featured game of the day, and I like well-done and clever clicker style games. I was happy to pay $2.99 even for a short game because I like supporting developers who don't resort to microtransactions for revenue. Well, I should have paid attention to the multiple reviews indicating that the game is completely broken. After working for a few hours, it is now stuck on a black loading screen. Hopefully, I'll be able to report a problem and get a refund once the transaction goes through. STAY AWAY!

I love this clicking game I just wish that there was more, like an endless mode where you can have randomly generated planets and solar systems, where you can compete with other players‚Äô scores or something that can keep me invested.

Please developer make a sequel üôèüèª
Loved the game, the AI was funny and the concept is great, I just wish there was more content!
Let me start by saying it‚Äôs a great game that‚Äôs why I gave it 3. But for 2.99 it‚Äôs not worth it how short it is...... that‚Äôs why it‚Äôs still a 3

This game is entertaining and funny at times but the game is extremely short and the end was a little disappointing if you‚Äôre not 5 and this is your first time seeing a the forth wall break. There are achievements no achievements which was a little disappointing but that‚Äôs not a major flaw. What really stands out (not in a good way) was the time it took to beat the game. It took me 2 days to beat the game which is extremely short. However if it went on for infinity like some clickers there wouldn‚Äôt be many of those funny lines your buddy tells you. So I‚Äôm not sure how I feel about that. To put it short, cool concept, wrong genre of game. Would be cool if you made it a pc/ console game where you land at reearth with the graphics of the main game and explore reearth with graphics of the cutscene where you land there for like 3 seconds and just make the game an open world explorer game. 2/5 stars because it could‚Äôve been really great with a bigger team and a better use of thought.

title.label: Good game but won‚Äôt load anymore

content.label: It was fun until it stopped loading. When I open the app, it‚Äôs just a black screen that never loads. Hope this gets fixed soon.

title.label: Was fun, until it just didn‚Äôt open anymore.

content.label: Fun game, kept evolving and creating new and interesting ways to play, but then it just stopped working. Every time I try to open the app it gets stuck at a black screen, try restarting and it does the same thing.

Although this games does do what it advertised to do. This should not be labeled as a clicker/idel game. Your paying $3 dollars for an interesting story with okay visuals and nice sound track. But ultimately the game falls short. 

Would not buy again. Can not recommend.

tl;dr game is a crappy clicker with a price tag.

This is a much smarter and more entertaining explanation of the universe than anything Stephen Hawking ever imagined. Keep a bag of potato chips or some french fries handy while you‚Äôre playing it because they are good to snack on.
Plz add iPhone X support

I have played all kinds of apps and all kinds of clickers. This doesn‚Äôt have much in the way of either. 

As an app there is almost nothing to it, the soundtrack is decent but doesn‚Äôt justify its price tag. It‚Äôs easily the most unambitious clicker and that‚Äôs okay, but it‚Äôs also shallow. There is truly no depth here and the game is actually even more shallow than it pretends to be. (The game‚Äôs use of breaking the forth wall might impress some but it‚Äôs weak and uninspired here)

As a clicker, there is nothing to it. It doesn‚Äôt even have the decency to offer extended play. You literally follow the same growth pattern two times and the game is complete. It is incomprehensible how disappointing this was, because I thought it was just warming up and then the credits roll. 

The only thing that made this game take longer than a few hours (unacceptable for a clicker even if it is deliberately designed to have an end) was this ridiculous resource sink toward the end. It has the player shooting away resources at tiny moving ‚Äòtargets‚Äô. Why? Simply to add some hours to a game that is void of even brevity. 

If this app were one dollar and sold as an art experiment or satirical commentary on the concept of clickers as entertainment in general, it‚Äôd still be a bit too on the nose to be worth it. As it stands anything more than one dollar is an insult. 

And for the record that dollar I think it did earn only did so for the music. It was cool every now and then. 

Hard pass.

title.label: A Clicker, but with a SCI FI story

content.label:
This maybe considered a ‚ÄúClicker‚Äù, but it is sooo much more. It‚Äôs a Clicker with a plot. It tells a story (A good one too). At no point during me playing this game did I feel bored. The writing was pretty good and it kept things interesting. If you have headphones or earbuds I would definitely recommend wearing them. The sound track to this game is one of the best ones I‚Äôve heard in awhile. It sounded like the Tron: Legacy sound track, but more serious I guess and moving. The ending of the game was by far my favorite part. 
     This game actually kind of inspired me in a way. Especially considering the small development team. I do hope the creator of this game continues to make more games/ content.
This game is perfect it provides a good story of what is happening and you don‚Äôt find that in clicker games to much.

This app is everything you would want on a clicker app? You‚Äôre probably thinking, ‚Äòwho on earth would pay $3 for an app‚Äô. Let me tell you something. What clicker app has an awesome ending and has missions such as, releasing probes, sending ships, sending rovers to gain data on the ‚Äòunknown‚Äô mass. For space nerds, such as me. I highly recommend this app.

When I saw this game I thought well it‚Äôs 3$ but I‚Äôll try it soon I‚Äôm reading the plan and thinks that well that‚Äôs completely confusing but.. why not I still don‚Äôt understand all of it but now I‚Äôm reading about quantum physics and time travel 
If your a dev read more 

I‚Äôd love to see more and maybe a more interactive version like alpha genesis or space engineers

This game was terrific, the story was amazing I love the word outputter, and all the completely accurate science but my one issue is the length of the game, it‚Äôs just too short for $3, I still absolutely love this game
This game is so good it needs a sequel
Very good game make the next one longer and also fix the exploit were you can change the time on your phone and get a bunch of Jules(scientifically accurate ftw)
This was a very intriguing game, one that I was happy to spend a few bucks on. Was. I haven‚Äôt been able to actually open the app for at least a month.
This app that costs less than a cup of coffee very well might be my favorite mobile game. The game design is unreal. Such a great evolution of the clicker game genre.

title.label: Close to perfect.  Scratch that.  Perfect

content.label: Idle clicker but more interesting.  There‚Äôs actually motivation and sort of a story.  Love the narration, style and music.  Thanks to all those who made this game!
For the cost of a cheap latte, what do you have to gain or loose, except perhaps spacetime itself - mind blown ü§Ø !

I like the game, especially when I‚Äôm out of internet range, but if you start to go a bit crazy and maximize every item and don‚Äôt feed the sun, the game will start to take longer and longer to startup.  Now I‚Äôm waiting five minutes and nothing happens.  I guess it‚Äôs poorly optimized when you start having hundreds of satellites and need to calculate energy for 90 minutes.

This is a nice little time waster for about 2-3 days of actively checking in while the game collects for you, as there‚Äôs no point in thumb mashing after a certain point since you generate so much power every second. Both times I‚Äôve attempted to play through the game I got the black screen of death near what I believe to be the end. The first time was shortly after the game came out; after just a few days ago. I figured certainly the devs would patch such a game-breaking issue on an app that costs people‚Äôs hard earned money; but sadly after much time.. they have not. 5/5 for terms of quality in sound and visual mechanics. Minus 2 stars for an unforgiving and game breaking bug that seems to pop up, with no patches in sight to fix it. Buyer beware; $3 you will not get back. Pick it up if it goes on sale.
Chorei vendo o final vale cada centavo,compre agora!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

I would have to tell you if you had three dollars that you didn‚Äôt know what to spend it with this would be the game for you.
The dialogue and ending are terrific, its what most people look for in a clicker game. Its space related which drove me too i was skeptical at first but now I'm glad i bought an played the game.

This game is 4 dollars so you would think it would last a long time but no it was able to beat the game in one day it‚Äôs fun but there is no updates to add more that just being able to eat the entire game in one day

This game is amazing I love the simplistic graphics and the dialogue always makes me smile. I say I‚Äôm not to far in the story but what I‚Äôve seen is that these developers sure can make some fine looking potato people.

title.label: I‚Äôm sorry, I wanted to like it.

content.label:
There‚Äôs only one clickable item; watts. After buying the solar panels, clicking doesn‚Äôt even matter. 

I have no idea what the stupid potatoes actually do. This is what you spend watts on - potatoes, how stupid (I guess the developer was trying to be querky). 

You just click on potatoes with your watts that don‚Äôt matter until the game sends you to the next planet. And again, I have no idea why. 

The ship has a narrative but the text is so small I can‚Äôt read it. 

The game ends after about 3 days. I should have  gotten a latte with my three bucks. Free idle clickers are better.

title.label: Doesn‚Äôt Work After I Play For A While

content.label:
This will be a short review.

I don‚Äôt why why, but this game, though so well made and an amazing start, I give it a 3 star for 2 reasons 1st is that it is very short and I finished it in 1 day, 2nd, after a while for playing it for a long time, it started not working and crashing, I don‚Äôt know why but even if it doesn‚Äôt, it won‚Äôt have a display, so please , please , please fix this.
This game is a five start just won‚Äôt let me put it down but can you make a spaceplan 2?

Not really a game. Text too small to read on a XS. Nice atmospheric sounds. 

I like clickers but this one doesn‚Äôt really go anywhere. If you wanted to teach someone how to play games on their phone this would be a good choice, but there really aren‚Äôt any choices to be made, there are no consequences, and the potato theme is lazy.

title.label: It was fun until it stopped saving...

content.label: This game was really fun the first night I played it but now it won‚Äôt save where I was at and keeps resetting my progress. Super frustrating.
This game is so fun and is worth the money but I beat it in like a day I wish it was longer

title.label: Best thing I‚Äôve done on my phone

content.label: I never write reviews. But this game is simply mindblowing and deserves all the attention and appreciation. It‚Äôs pretty straightforward but doesn‚Äôt bore like other typical clicker games out there, plus the visuals and music are amazing. It‚Äôs also probably the most UK thing I‚Äôve stumbled upon in the Appstore (spuds and tea, i mean...) but it‚Äôs genuinely unique and lovely. Kudos to the developers and everyone involved in its making. Would definitely recommend.
Was interested...good concept but completed in less then 8 hours.
Enjoyed it until I had to sit through you flexing your animation and rendering ability for 10 minutes only to be greeted by credits after waiting all that time.

Only word I really have for this game is WoW, it was amazing, at first I was unsure how long it was going to go but the wait was worth every second, the ending was mind blowing. To the devs of this you did an outstanding job and it‚Äôs a game that is worth every penny. I restarted just to have that fun again. One of the only games I‚Äôve ever played to completion that I was able to say I enjoyed every second of.

The story is funny and witty. The game is a clicker but without micro transactions and there is an end. 

I wish there was more story and game. Maybe a new game plus?

I never write reviews. Seriously, never. However I feel compelled to by this game.  This game is beautifully balanced. Simplicity at its best. It‚Äôs in gauging, funny and never gets burdensome. The sound track is amazing. Yes it‚Äôs short but it is worth every penny. I mean it‚Äôs only 300 pennies. And the ending, wow! You have to try it.

Overall the game was very intuitive and fun to play. For $3 I was expecting something a little longer, it only took me two days to finish the story line and at the end you‚Äôre prompted to either go back to the beginning of the end sequence or delete the save and start over maybe add another option to just go back to Earth and keep grinding? Something just to make it last a little longer and not feel like I wasted $3 on a game I could only play for 2 days. There are many free clicker games out there that are virtually infinite, whereas this paid one is not.
so annoying

The game is amazing totally should cost $5 for what you get. It is funny and awesome at the same time. I love the potatoe puns, my favorite would be the spudnik. I reccomed this game to every one. I rarely right a review for games and this game was so fun I had too. I praciticly played this game through my entire flight. I have always love devolver games and hope they make more games. It is a very creative and amzing story. I love this game (if you couldn‚Äôt already tell). Thank you devoler and the makers of this game for well making this game.
Man it‚Äôs awesome to actually pay for a game that pays for it self. It‚Äôs a great time killer for fokes on the move like me.  Very in depth and perceptive.  Extremely impressed.
SPACEPLAN is a fantastic game, but for the past few days it has not been working. I hope you fix this because I really love the game. Thank you!!!!

I was playing the game for a couple of days and when I got on the game instead of playing it wouldn‚Äôt work so I don‚Äôt renege might recommend wasting your money for this game that does not work and I don‚Äôt know if there‚Äôs a way to fix it

title.label: A year without update? So no iPhone X Support

content.label: Very annoyed at the fact this game hasn‚Äôt had support for over a year. Where is the iPhone X screen resolution update? We‚Äôll be headed off to the next iPhone and this app has yet to see support for some time now. This is my major gripe. Other than that it was a great game on my iPhone 7 Plus when I had it. Please update.
The game is overall very enjoyable, but it is hard to click rapidly with such a small button so I was wondering if you could shrink the planet display to grow the button just a little

The game is phenomenal and I would recommend this to anyone who likes space and a bit of science. The robot who talks to you is funny, and the potato puns. Dear god the potato puns.

Anyways, I would like to make a complaint, not about the game, but about the reviewers. People are rating the game low ( 2 or 3 stars ) because they had a bug or glitch that effected their game play. It would be better if people just stated what they liked and appreciated about the game and then making a note for the developers that says what went wrong with the game.
